The Artist's Wife

Ano: 2019

IMDb ID: tt5806558

Classificação: 5.9

Sinopse: As the wife of famed artist Richard Smithson, Claire leads a quiet life. Once she was an artist with great potential, but now Claire is forced to be in the shadow of her husband's success. During active work on a new painting, Richard's mood becomes more and more unstable, and then the artist is diagnosed with dementia. As his health rapidly deteriorates, Claire hides Richard's troubles from the art community in an attempt to reunite her husband with his estranged daughter from a previous marriage and grandson.—Bazza the Beast
